舊.definition: old; opposite: new 新; former; worn (with age)

舊五代史.definition: History of the Five Dynasties (between Tang and Song), eighteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Xue Juzheng 薛居正[Xue1 Ju1 zheng4] in 974 during Northern Song 北宋[Bei3 Song4], 150 scrolls

舊例.definition: old rules; example from the past; former practices

舊制.definition: old system; weights and measures of former times

舊唐書.definition: History of the Early Tang Dynasty, sixteenth of the 24 dynastic histories 二十四史[Er4 shi2 si4 Shi3], compiled under Liu Xu 劉昫|刘昫[Liu2 Xu4] in 945 during Later Jin 後晉|后晋[Hou4 Jin4] of the Five Dynasties, 200 scrolls

舊地重遊.definition: (idiom) to return to a place after a long time away

舊大陸.definition: the Old World; Eurasia as opposed to the New World 新大陸|新大陆[xin1 da4 lu4] or the Americas

舊字體.definition: kyujitai, traditional Japanese character used before 1946

舊學.definition: old learning; Chinese traditional teaching as opposed to material from the West

舊年.definition: last year; the Chinese New Year (i.e. the new year in the old calendar)

舊惡.definition: old wrong; past grievance; wickedness of former times

舊愁新恨.definition: old worries with new hatred added (idiom); afflicted by problems old and new

舊態復萌.definition: see 故態復萌|故态复萌[gu4 tai4 fu4 meng2]

舊教.definition: old teachings; wisdom from the past

舊時.definition: in former times; the olden days

舊景重現.definition: scenes of the past reappear; evocation of the past

舊曆.definition: old calendar; the Chinese lunar calendar; same as 農曆|农历[nong2 li4]

舊書.definition: second-hand book; old book; ancient book

舊案.definition: old court case; long-standing legal dispute

舊業.definition: one's old profession; trade of one's forebears

舊民主主義革命.pinyin: jiu4 min2 zhu3 zhu3 yi4 ge2 ming4
舊民主主義革命.definition: old democratic revolution; bourgeois revolution (in Marx-Leninist theory, a prelude to the proletarian revolution)

舊物.definition: old property (esp. inherited from former generation); former territory

舊瓶裝新酒.definition: lit. new wine in old bottles; fig. new concepts in an old framework; (loan idiom from Matthew 9:17, but fig. meaning is opposite)

舊病復發.definition: old illness recurs (idiom); a relapse; fig. to repeat an old error; the same old problem

舊的不去，新的不來.pinyin: jiu4 de5 bu4 qu4 , xin1 de5 bu4 lai2
舊的不去，新的不來.definition: lit. If the old doesn't go, the new will not come.; You can't make progress by clinging to old notions.

舊稱.definition: old term; old way of referring to sth

舊聞.definition: outdated news; old anecdote; stories passed on from former times

舊觀.definition: former appearance; what it used to look like

舊詩.definition: old verse; poetry in the old style

舊調子.definition: old tune; fig. conservative opinion; the same old stuff

舊調重彈.definition: replaying the same old tunes (idiom); conservative, unoriginal and discredited; to keep harping on about the same old stuff

舊貨.definition: second-hand goods; used items for sale

舊貨市場.definition: sale of second-hand goods; flea market

舊賬.definition: lit. old account; old debt; fig. old scores to settle; old quarrels; old grudge

舊跡.definition: old traces; signs from the past

舊車市場.definition: second-hand car market; used bike market

舊遊.definition: place one has previously visited; old haunts

舊體.definition: old form of writing; piece in the old style
